newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: European bunkers soften, demand poor.
newsitem.headline: European bunkers soften, demand poor.

text.p: Rotterdam fuel oil bunkers came off on Friday with very little demand, while prices in southern Europe were likewise softer, dealers said.
Rotterdam 380 CST fuel oil bunkers were sold at $83.50/$84 fob. Most traders said poor demand was behind the weakness.
Total ARA demand barely reached 10,000 tonnes.
Hamburg prices, meanwhile, firmed on short term supply tightness, although buying was poor. Fuel oil 380 CST was quoted at around $92/$93 fob.
Mediterranean prices were mostly off $1/$2 on fuel oil. As in northern Europe, demand was lacklustre.
"We brought the prices down even more than seemed necessary to get some business, but have managed almost nothing," one supplier said.
